entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who knows about the map being confiscated by Mr. Filch. He is looking at Harry more seriously than ever before.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has possession of the map. Lupin is talking to him and is concerned about his actions.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who confiscated the map many years ago.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who thinks Harry got the map from the manufacturers.

entities.name: mapmakers
entities.description: Mapmakers are an organization that would want to lure Harry out of school.

relationships.description: Lupin is concerned about Harry's actions regarding the map.
Snape suspects that Harry got the map from the manufacturers.
Mapmakers would want to lure Harry out of school.
